posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian C.
I have the following Helmars available to trade: 

HOF: Baker, Bender, Bresnahan, Carey, Chance, Collins; Crawford, Evers, Griffith, Huggins, Jennings, Johnson, Lajoie, Mathewson, Tinker, Wallace, Wheat. 

Non-HOF: Murphy (Phil A), Oldring (Phil A), O'Toole (Pitt), Ferry (Pitt), Wilson (Pitt), Wolverton (NY A), Street (NY A), Herzog (NY N), Drucke (NY N), Ball (Cle), Stanage (Det A), Beck (Phil N), Titus (Phil N), Scanlan (Phil N), Moore (Phil N), Austin (StL A), Hughes (Wash), Gray (Wash A), Grant (Cinn), Sullivan (Chi A), Lennox (Chi N)

I would consider trades for Helmars of Donlin, McGraw, Oakes, Paskert, Speaker, Suggs.

Posted By: Brian C.
Thanks for the inquiries. To clarify, the Helmars are for trade and are not for sale.
